artist: Designer: John Prip; Manufacturer: Reed & Barton
creditline: Gift of Christopher P. Monkhouse in honor of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: flat base; body flares slightly out from base, in at neck; thin, tapering spout; hinged cover with triangular finial, rounded at top; handle wrapped with black insulating material
markings: on bottom, stamped: [REED & BARTON / PEWTER (inside an oval) / P200 / 48]; under cover, stamped: [48]
title: Coffeepot, from the "Denmark" coffee service
